# sonatyperepo_capability_ui_branding (Resource)

Manage Capability: UI Branding
		
**NOTE:** Requires Sonatype Nexus Repostiory 3.84.0 or later.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sonatyperepo_capability_ui_branding" "cap" {
  enabled = true
  notes   = ""
  properties = {
    header_enabled = true
    header_html    = "TESTING 1 2 3"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the Capability is enabled.
- `properties` (Attributes) Properties specific to this Capability type (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--properties))

### Optional

- `notes` (String) Optional notes about configured capability.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The internal ID of the Capability.
- `last_updated` (String)

<a id="nestedatt--properties"></a>
### Nested Schema for `properties`

Optional:

- `footer_enabled` (Boolean) Enable branding header HTML snippet.
- `footer_html` (String) An HTML snippet to be included in branding header. Use '$baseUrl' to insert the base URL of the server (e.g. to reference an image).
- `header_enabled` (Boolean) Enable branding header HTML snippet.
- `header_html` (String) An HTML snippet to be included in branding header. Use '$baseUrl' to insert the base URL of the server (e.g. to reference an image).

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import an existing UI Branding Capability into Terraform State.
#
# NOTE: The CAPABILITY_ID can be obtained from the datasource.

# Example
terraform import sonatyperepo_capability_ui_branding.cap CAPABILITY_ID
```
